name: Jewel King: Diamond Smash
description:
Let's step in the charming jewel kingdom above the sky with the princess and her best buddy,
Explore the mysterious jewel land, meet new friends, and embark on an enchanting adventure.
Download Jewel King: Diamond Smash Match 3 for free now and enjoy the mania of the miracle jewel kingdom
Link gems with same color to collect treasures for the princess. While a link between 6 or gems is made, butterflies will put special gems in a random cell.
The Link between 3 or more special gems will create fever combos which may clean up the table in one single move.
When you can't make any move. Gems will be relocated into new cells.
Pay attention to troublesome mole, mouse or rock machine before you ran out of move.
Jewel King: Diamond Smash Match 3 is free to play but you can buy powerup items such as extra moves or even powerful special gems with real money.
Jewel King: Diamond Smash Match 3 outstanding features:
# Stunning graphics and effects set in a beautiful fairy saga
# 200 puzzling levels with different difficulty, divided into 8 game modes
Finish the Orders: Collect gems in order for the jewel princess
Rescue the tiger: Clear the way for tiger to come back to his house
Collect the Gold: Bring back all the gold bars for the kingdom
Catch the Moles: Help princess to catch all the Moles
Drop the pearls: Clear the path for the pearls to drop to the bottom
Find the hidden Treasures: Retrieve all treasures hidden underground.
Catch the rats: Use special gems combo to smash the rats
Defeat the boss: Destroy the powerful enemies of jewel kingdom
# Unlockable 10 cute pets
# Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
